description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Installer Elevation of Privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-21436):

1. Identify the version of Windows you are using from the list of affected builds.
2. Download the appropriate update package using the links provided below.
3. Install the update to address the vulnerability.
4. Restart your system as required to complete the installation process.

**Details**:
- For Windows 11 Version 23H2, the relevant KB Article is KB5035853.
- For Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems, use KB5035845.
- Ensure you have administrative privileges to apply these updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with any installation.

**Update Packages**:
- [KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845)
- [KB5035858](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035858)
- [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
- [KB5035854](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035854)
